title: Boart Longyear selects John Galt Solutions for Demand Planning
text:
John Galt Solutions
CHICAGO , Oct. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- John Galt Solutions announced today that Boart Longyear, the world's leading provider of drilling services, drilling equipment, and performance tooling for mining and drilling companies globally, has selected John Galt's Atlas Planning Suite as its new demand planning solution .
Boart Longyear sought a new system for forecasting and demand planning as they took the decision to move from a labor intensive, spreadsheet-centric process to a more automated approach. Boart Longyear chose John Galt's Atlas Planning Suite because of its robust forecasting capabilities and configurability.
"We needed a system for our complex global business," said Andreas Werner , Global Planning Manager and S&OP Lead. " John Galt was able to provide a solution that has the flexibility to grow with us. John Galt has been great to work with and we look forward to growing our partnership with them."
"Boart Longyear is in a great place to really capitalize on what Atlas Planning Suite can do for them," said Anne Omrod , President & CEO of John Galt Solutions. "Delivering an accurate forecast to all stakeholders automatically increases their efficiencies and enables them to take their S&OP to the next level."
About John Galt Solutions
John Galt Solutions helps mid-market companies build effective demand and supply plans. If you or your team are just getting started with a planning process, John Galt offers tools & training to jumpstart your forecasting process. Once your forecasting process is defined, John Galt offers the solutions and education to build this forecast into a full demand and supply plan. Visit www.johngalt.com to learn how to start with planning today.
